contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM
AND NOW, this 22nd day of May, 2017, the order of the Lehigh County Court of Common Pleas dated May 31, 2016 is REVERSED based on our decision in Villani v. Seibert, 639 Pa. 58, 159 A.3d 478 (2017), and the matter is REMANDED for further proceedings.
The Motion to Quash is DENIED.
